did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: Washington County, VA Daybook contains names, items, and prices from an unidentified business.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Washington County, VA Daybook must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Washington County, VA Daybook, Ms2011-068, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Washington County, VA Daybook was completed in August 2011.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Daybook contains a chronological listing of names, prices, and purchases of various items including food stuffs, tobacco, and shoes. All entries date from 1896. The owner and type of business for this daybook are unknown.
The area of origin was inferred based upon names searched in the 1900 census records.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection is arranged by material type.
